import React from "react"; import { Navbar, Nav, Container, Badge } from 'react-bootstrap' import { FaShoppingCart, FaUser } from 'react-icons/fa' import {LinkContainer} from 'react-router-bootstrap' import logo from '../assets/logo.png' import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; const Header = () => { const {cartItems:cart}= useSelector(state=>state.cart) console.log('cart',cart) return (
ProShop
Cart { cart.length >0 && () } Sign In
) } export default Header
